messages.content: You are an assistant that will recommend food for the user.
I want you to recommend me a menu, i made beef.
i see you are making beef, i will recommend you making Jewell Ball'S Chicken
what is the recipe for beef and how to make it?

{ingredients : ['Place chipped beef on bottom of baking dish.', 'Place chicken on top of beef.', 'Mix soup and cream together; pour over chicken. Bake uncovered at 275° for 3 hours.']  steps : ['1 small jar chipped beef cut up', '4 boned chicken breasts', '1 can cream of mushroom soup', '1 carton sour cream']}

what is the recipe for frozen corn and how to make it?

{ingredients : ['In a slow cooker combine all ingredients. Cover and cook on low for 4 hours or until heated through and cheese is melted. Stir well before serving. Yields 6 servings.']  steps : ['2 (16 oz.) pkg. frozen corn', '1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese cubed', '1/3 c. butter cubed', '1/2 tsp. garlic powder', '1/2 tsp. salt', '1/4 tsp. pepper']}

I want you to recommend me a menu, i made chicken.
i see you are making chicken, i will recommend you making Chicken Funny
what is the recipe for chicken and how to make it?

{ingredients : ['Boil and debone chicken.', 'Put bite size pieces in average size square casserole dish.', 'Pour gravy and cream of mushroom soup over chicken; level.', 'Make stuffing according to instructions on box (do not make too moist).', 'Put stuffing on top of chicken and gravy; level.', 'Sprinkle shredded cheese on top and bake at 350° for approximately 20 minutes or until golden and bubbly.']  steps : ['1 large whole chicken', '2 (10 1/2 oz.) cans chicken gravy', '1 (10 1/2 oz.) can cream of mushroom soup', '1 (6 oz.) box Stove Top stuffing', '4 oz. shredded cheese']}

{ingredients : ['Combine first four ingredients and press in 13 x 9-inch ungreased pan.', 'Melt chocolate chips and spread over mixture. Refrigerate for about 20 minutes and cut into pieces before chocolate gets hard.', 'Keep in refrigerator.']  steps : ['1 c. peanut butter', '3/4 c. graham cracker crumbs', '1 c. melted butter', '1 lb. (3 1/2 c.) powdered sugar', '1 large pkg. chocolate chips']}

You are an assistant that will recommend food for the user.
I want you to recommend me a menu, i made baking potatoes.
i see you are making baking potatoes, i will recommend you making Cheeseburger Potato Soup
what is the recipe for baking potatoes and how to make it?

{ingredients : ['Wash potatoes; prick several times with a fork.', 'Microwave them with a wet paper towel covering the potatoes on high for 6-8 minutes.', 'The potatoes should be soft ready to eat.', 'Let them cool enough to handle.', 'Cut in half lengthwise; scoop out pulp and reserve.', 'Discard shells.', 'Brown ground beef until done.', 'Drain any grease from the meat.', 'Set aside when done.', 'Meat will be added later.', 'Melt butter in a large kettle over low heat; add flour stirring until smooth.', 'Cook 1 minute stirring constantly. Gradually add milk; cook over medium heat stirring constantly until thickened and bubbly.', 'Stir in potato ground beef salt pepper 1 cup of cheese 2 tablespoons of green onion and 1/2 cup of bacon.', 'Cook until heated (do not boil).', 'Stir in sour cream if desired; cook until heated (do not boil).', 'Sprinkle with remaining cheese bacon and green onions.']  steps : ['6 baking potatoes', '1 lb. of extra lean ground beef', '2/3 c. butter or margarine', '6 c. milk', '3/4 tsp. salt', '1/2 tsp. pepper', '1 1/2 c (6 oz.) shredded Cheddar cheese divided', '12 sliced bacon cooked crumbled and divided', '4 green onion chopped and divided', '1 (8 oz.) carton sour cream (optional)']}
You are an assistant that will recommend food for the user.
